[Default Proposal]
Cafe24 AI Solution

1. Target: Person in charge of government e-commerce related department or e-commerce related business manager
2. Proposer: Cafe24 (Korea's representative global e-commerce platform operator)
3. Proposal Title: Cafe24 E-Commerce AI Solution (Edibot Series)
4. Introduction of proposed solutions
* Eddybot is an AI service that analyzes and classifies hundreds of product images in just a few seconds with an artificial intelligence big data-based shopping mall content creation/editing function and automatically completes detailed pages. With various templates, it makes creating product detail pages even simpler.Automatic image analysis using AI
=================================

Eddybot automatically classifies uploaded images according to model/color/detailed images and arranges them based on big data, resulting in a detailed product page. AI recognition of image categories and colors makes it easy to create pages and recommend necessary product information.User-friendly UI like a blog
============================

Eddybot offers a user-friendly interface, similar to a blog, allowing even beginners to easily handle content creation with just a few clicks and drags for text input, image placement, and video insertion.Trendy frames and stickers
==========================

Eddybot provides a free frame function for placing images and various sticker functions to encourage purchasing. Custom templates can be created for product pages.
* Edibot Design allows even beginners without design expertise in HTML and CSS to design their own customized shopping mall with just a few clicks. It creates sophisticated shopping mall designs optimized for both PC and mobile environments.Easy shopping mall design creation
==================================

Anyone can easily create a sophisticated shopping mall design, even without design production skills such as HTML and CSS. Simply drag and drop with a mouse to change the layout according to desired configurations.Automatically optimized for PC and mobile
=========================================

Edibot Design provides a free responsive theme that resizes automatically for optimization in various mobile environments, such as PCs, smartphones, and tablets.Large number of free design sources
===================================

Over 1500 different design sources, such as icons and menu area designs, are provided to customize various design areas, such as the shopping mall main screen, product menu, and review page.
Did you keep the [Default proposal] form?
Yes, I kept the [Default proposal] form for the second content.
I don't think it's a PPT slide format?

Sorry about that. Here's the second content in the default proposal format:

[Default Proposal]

Target: Person in charge of government e-commerce related department or e-commerce related business manager
Proposer: Cafe24 (Korea's representative global e-commerce platform operator)
Proposal Title: Cafe24 E-Commerce AI Solution (Edibot Series)

Introduction of Proposed Solutions:

* Eddybot is an AI service that analyzes and classifies hundreds of product images in just a few seconds with an artificial intelligence big data-based shopping mall content creation/editing function and automatically completes detailed pages.
* Automatic image analysis using AI: Eddybot can automatically classify uploaded images according to model/color/detailed images and arrange images based on big data. AI recognition of image categories and colors makes it easy to create product introduction pages.
* User-friendly UI like a blog: Eddybot has a user interface that is easy to use, similar to a blog. Beginners can become professional content designers with just a few clicks and drags for tasks such as text input, image placement, and video insertion.
* Trendy frames and stickers: Eddybot provides a free frame function to place images and various free sticker functions to encourage purchases. These can be used to create custom templates and product pages.
* Edibot Design: Beginners without design expertise (e.g., HTML, CSS) can design their own customized shopping mall with just a few clicks using Edibot Design. The service provides a responsive theme that resizes automatically for PC and mobile environments.
* Large number of free design sources: Edibot Design provides over 1500 different design sources such as icons and menu area designs, allowing customization of various design areas such as the shopping mall main screen, product menu, and review page.

번역결과죄송합니다. 다음은 기본 제안 형식의 두 번째 내용입니다.

[기본 제안]

대상: 정부 전자상거래 관련 부서 담당자 또는 전자상거래 관련 사업 관리자
제안: 카페24(대한민국 대표 글로벌 전자상거래 플랫폼 사업자)
제안제목: 카페24 전자상거래 AI 솔루션(에디봇 시리즈)

제안 솔루션 소개:

* Eddybot은 수백 개의 상품 이미지를 한번에 분석하고 분류하는 AI 서비스다. 인공지능 빅데이터 기반 쇼핑몰 콘텐츠 생성/편집 기능으로 몇 초 만에 상세페이지 자동완성 빅데이터를 기반으로 이미지를 만들고 정렬합니다. AI가 이미지 카테고리와 색상을 인식하여 제품 소개 페이지를 쉽게 생성할 수 있습니다.
* 블로그처럼 사용하기 쉬운 UI: Eddybot은 블로그처럼 사용하기 쉬운 사용자 인터페이스를 가지고 있습니다. 초보자도 텍스트 입력, 이미지 배치, 동영상 삽입 등의 작업을 몇 번의 클릭과 드래그만으로 전문 콘텐츠 디자이너가 될 수 있습니다.
* 트렌디한 프레임 및 스티커: Eddybot은 무료 프레임 기능을 제공하여 이미지와 다양한 구매를 유도하는 무료 스티커 기능. 이를 이용하여 맞춤형 템플릿 및 상품 페이지를 생성할 수 있습니다.
* Edibot Design: HTML, CSS 등 디자인 전문 지식이 없는 초보자도 Edibot Design을 사용하여 몇 번의 클릭만으로 나만의 맞춤형 쇼핑몰을 디자인할 수 있습니다. PC 및 모바일 환경에 맞게 자동으로 크기가 조정되는 반응형 테마를 제공하는 서비스입니다.
* 대량의 무료 디자인 소스: 에디봇 디자인은 아이콘, 메뉴 영역 디자인 등 1500여 가지의 다양한 디자인 소스를 제공하여 다양한 디자인의 커스터마이징이 가능합니다. 쇼핑몰 메인화면, 상품메뉴, 리뷰페이지 등의 영역
